## RemotePlaywright interface

Reference to objects implementing the [BrowserType](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-browsertype) interface from playwright and allowing to start and control instances of chromium, firefox and webkit. This interface is returned from [connectRemotePlaywright()](./assistive-playwright-client.connectremoteplaywright.md) and allows to remotely control those browsers with the Playwright API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RemotePlaywright 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [chromium](./assistive-playwright-client.remoteplaywright.chromium.md) | BrowserType&lt;ChromiumBrowser&gt; | Reference to an object implementing the [BrowserType](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-browsertype) interface from playwright allowing to control chromium. |
|  [firefox](./assistive-playwright-client.remoteplaywright.firefox.md) | BrowserType&lt;FirefoxBrowser&gt; | Reference to an object implementing the [BrowserType](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-browsertype) interface from playwright allowing to control firefox. |
|  [webkit](./assistive-playwright-client.remoteplaywright.webkit.md) | BrowserType&lt;WebKitBrowser&gt; | Reference to an object implementing the [BrowserType](https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-browsertype) interface from playwright allowing to control webkit. |
